beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE PEDT025 USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePath}PEDT025.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_ENT REFERENCED_COD_ENT from PEDT025_standardized_and_validated base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS)

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_MAE_PERSONAS_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_MAE_PERSONAS_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_PER REFERENCED_COD_PER from PEDT025_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp0 base left outer join HE1_MX_MAE_PERSONAS_DRO ref on (base.COD_PART=ref.COD_PER and base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS)

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_INF_GPOS_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_INF_GPOS_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_GPO_ECON REFERENCED_COD_GPO_ECON from PEDT025_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp1 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_INF_GPOS_DRO ref on (base.COD_GPO_ECON=ref.COD_GPO_ECON and base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS)

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_CVE_REG REFERENCED_COD_CVE_REG from PEDT025_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp2 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO ref on (base.COD_TIPO_VINCULO=ref.COD_CVE_REG and base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS) where ref.COD_SIGLA_IDIOMA='E' and ref.COD_TAB_GEN='0266'

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_CVE_REG REFERENCED_COD_CVE_REG from PEDT025_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp3 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO ref on (base.COD_TIPO_RELAC=ref.COD_CVE_REG and base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS) where ref.COD_SIGLA_IDIOMA='E' and ref.COD_TAB_GEN='0267'

afterAll.sql: select * from errors_PEDT025_standardized_and_validated union all select * from errors_PEDT025_standardized_and_validated_and_domain0 union all select * from errors_PEDT025_standardized_and_validated_and_domain1 union all select * from errors_PEDT025_standardized_and_validated_and_domain2 union all select * from errors_PEDT025_standardized_and_validated_and_domain3 union all select * from errors_PEDT025_standardized_and_validated_and_domain4
